# plmg-slider



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                                                                                                                                                                        | Type       | Default     |
| -------------- | --------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------- | ----------- |
| `defaultValue` | `default-value` | Define the default value  Allowed: A number                                                                                                                                        | `number`   | `undefined` |
| `marks`        | `marks`         | Define if mark values are used  Default: true                                                                                                                                      | `boolean`  | `true`      |
| `rangeValues`  | --              | Define the range of value  Array must include at least two items  Required  First and last items in the array set the minimum and max values  Additional items set the mark values | `number[]` | `undefined` |
| `step`         | `step`          |  Define step  Can be any number                                                                                                                                                    | `number`   | `undefined` |
| `thumbLabel`   | `thumb-label`   | Thumb label visibility  Default: Visible                                                                                                                                           | `boolean`  | `true`      |
